name: haptic
description: Straightforward reactive web rendering in TSX
author: Gen Hames

scripts.size:each:
cd publish; find . -name 'index.js' | xargs -I @ bash -c 'printf "%15s | %5s min+gzip bytes
" @ "$(cat @ | gzip -9 | wc -c)"'
scripts.size:bundle: echo $(esbuild --bundle src/index.ts --format=esm --minify | gzip -9 | wc -c) min+gzip bytes
